name: Sliding Bob
description:
"It was the year 2030 when the world descended into chaos. The apocalypse had begun and the souls of the lost walked the streets as zombies. Bob, whose happy family lived the best life one could imagine, was visited by a horde of these creatures and forced to witness the killing and consumption of his loved ones.

Amidst all this suffering and pain, however, Bob found the strength to improve himself. He turned his pain into strength and his grief into determination. Day and night, he trained until he transformed himself into a deadly weapon.

And so Bob set out to take revenge on the zombies who had taken his family. He fought with all his might and killed as many of them as he could, hoping to find peace someday. But until then, Bob would continue to fight, until he had fulfilled his mission and the world was safe again for all those still alive."

-ItsIdzA

P.S.: It's just a simple game I programmed in a few hours, so don't expect too much. I hope it's funny anyways :D !
